plot: Derek comes back to the neighborhood he grew up in and hates. The projects are giving way to Whole Foods, the rents are insane and kids are fighting in dungeons with swords and axes. Wait, swords and axes?
plot_en: Derek comes back to the neighborhood he grew up in and hates. The projects are giving way to Whole Foods, the rents are insane and kids are fighting in dungeons with swords and axes. Wait, swords and axes?
plot_es: Derek comes back to the neighborhood he grew up in and hates. The projects are giving way to Whole Foods, the rents are insane and kids are fighting in dungeons with swords and axes. Wait, swords and axes?
title: The Battle Below
